COMMAND.name: save
COMMAND.help: Save igmp settings

COMMAND.name: exit
COMMAND.help: Save igmp settings and exit current mode

COMMAND.name: cancel
COMMAND.help: Roll back igmp settings changes

COMMAND.name: Enable
COMMAND.help: Specify the igmp proxy should enable or disable

PARAM.name: enable
PARAM.help: Specify the igmp proxy should enable or disable

COMMAND.name: UpStreamInterface_WAN1
COMMAND.help: This command is used to select WAN upstream interface for WAN1

COMMAND.name: UpStreamInterface_WAN2
COMMAND.help: This command is used to select WAN upstream interface for WAN2

COMMAND.name: save
COMMAND.help: Save igmp snooping settings

COMMAND.name: exit
COMMAND.help: Save igmp snooping settings and exit current mode

COMMAND.name: cancel
COMMAND.help: Roll back igmp snooping settings changes

COMMAND.name: Enable
COMMAND.help: Specify the igmp snooping should enable or disable

PARAM.name: enable
PARAM.help: Specify the igmp snooping should enable or disable

COMMAND.name: save
COMMAND.help: Save igmp portmap settings

COMMAND.name: exit
COMMAND.help: Save igmp portmap settings and exit current mode

COMMAND.name: cancel
COMMAND.help: Roll back igmp portmap settings changes

COMMAND.name: portmembership
COMMAND.help: Specify the igmp port membership to the selected vlan

PARAM.name: portmap
PARAM.help: Specify the igmp port membership to the selected vlan

COMMAND.name: net igmp
COMMAND.help: igmp configuration commands

COMMAND.name: net igmp configure
COMMAND.help: Specify igmp proxy should be enable or disable

COMMAND.name: net igmp snooping
COMMAND.help: igmp snooping configuration commands

COMMAND.name: net igmp snooping configure
COMMAND.help: Specify igmp snooping should be enable or disable

COMMAND.name: net igmp portmap
COMMAND.help: igmp snooping portmap configuration commands

COMMAND.name: net igmp portmap configure
COMMAND.help: Specify igmp port map configuration

PARAM.name: vlanId
PARAM.help: Enter unique vlan id to map igmp portmembership

COMMAND.name: show net igmp
COMMAND.help: Display igmp configuration

COMMAND.name: show net igmp snooping
COMMAND.help: Display igmp snooping configuration
